comments.body: username and password are part of common argument spec so to update a password user has to provide new and old both passwords. Using the password field in common argument spec user will specify the new password and with the option old_password user will specify old password or default password (Avi controller image is shipped with a default password can be used once only to update the password to bootstrap)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@requirements: [ avisdk ]
options:
    old_password:
        description:
            - Old password for update password or default password for bootstrap.
